snippet: Zach Johnson relied on great wedge play and a few timely putts for a seven-under-par 66 to take a three-stroke lead after two rounds of the Tournament of Champions in Hawaii.
abstract: Zach Johnson takes a three-stroke lead after two rounds of the Tournament of Champions in Hawaii.
lead_paragraph: Zach Johnson relied on great wedge play and a few timely putts for a seven-under-par 66 to take a three-stroke lead after two rounds of the Tournament of Champions in Hawaii.
